title: Design a Satellite Power System
description: An engineer is designing the electrical power system for a new satellite, including solar panels and batteries.

tasks.description: Calculate the satellite's power budget, including the power consumption of all subsystems during different operational modes (e.g., day, night, data transmission).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed power budget.

tasks.description: Size the solar arrays to generate enough power to run the satellite and charge the batteries during the sunlit portion of the orbit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the required size and efficiency of the solar panels.

tasks.description: Size the batteries to have enough capacity to power the satellite through the longest possible eclipse period with a safe depth of discharge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the required battery capacity in amp-hours.
